info.description: This API can be used by client application to manage identities according to their contrat definition
info.title: Identity store API

parameters.name: Request body
parameters.description: An Identity Change Request

parameters.name: client_code
parameters.description: Client code of the requester that is used to validate every request over its service contract

parameters.name: author_name
parameters.description: Name of the author that signs the request

parameters.name: author_type
parameters.description: Type of the author that signs the request

parameters.name: application_code
parameters.description: Application code of the requester. If sent, the adequation between the client code and this application code will be verified.

400.description: An error occurred during the treatment. with explanation message

put.summary: Test the data validity for the update of an Identity
put.description: Send the data through all the controls. Even if all the controls are passing correctly, the identity will NOT be updated.

put.summary: uncertifies all attributes of an existing Identity
put.description: The uncertify process is NOT conditioned by the service contract definition associated to the client application code. All attributes of the identity will be uncertified, regardless of the service contract.

parameters.description: Customer ID of the identity
